summary: A family moves to the country to run a rustic mountain inn when, to their horror, the customers begin befalling sudden and unlikely fates.
cast: Kenji Sawada|Keiko Matsuzaka|Shinji Takeda|Naomi Nishida|Kiyoshirô Imawano|Tetsurô Tanba|Naoto Takenaka|Tamaki Miyazaki|Takashi Matsuzaki|Yoshiki Arizono|Chihiro Asakawa|Masahiro Asakawa|Ken'ichi Endô|Moeko Ezawa|Mutsumi Fujita|Akiko Hatakeyama|Yumeki Kanazawa|Shôken Kunimoto|Maro|Aya Meguro|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Yuka Nakatani|Miho Sawada|Tokitoshi Shiota
title: La felicidad de los Katakuri
